translator.description:
Similar words: er, zaber, zebb. 
Can be used in conjunction with the word 'b/bi' to curse someone or someone's family/belongings: 
- ayre fik (fuck you) 
- ayre b chaklak (fuck your looks) 
- ayre b emmak (fuck your mom) 
Can also be used to express shock, disgust, frustration, disappointment: 
- w er / w zaber (what the fuck) 
- ayre b zabre (fuck me *lit. my dick in my dick*)

Similar words: ott, zaber, zebb. 
Can be used to curse someone's female relatives, mainly the mother or the sister: 
- Mother: kess emmak (fuck your mom) 
- Sister: kess ekhtak (fuck your sister). 
Can also be used to describe someone as a pussy: chou hal kess/kesseye (what a pussy). 
Can also be used to express frustration: 
- KESSS (FUCKKK). 
*Note: use at your own risk because cursing someone's mother or sister can backfire really hard.*

translator.english: fuck you (lit. my dick inside you)
translator.description:
Common way to express various emotions: 
- Anger: ayre fik (fuck you) 
- Annoyance: khalas ayre fik ya zalame (fuck off) 
- Excitement: HAHAHAHAH AYRE FIK (love you) 
- Praise: ayre fik chou awe (you're insane)

Can be used in several contexts mainly to tell someone to shut up. 
Can also be used as masmis / masmse (male / female respectively)

translator.english: Words to use in this format: ayre b ... / kess ekht ... / kess emm ...
translator.description:
**Family:** 
- Father -> bayyak, abouk, weldak 
- Mother -> emmak, ommak, weledtak 
- Brother -> khayyak, akhouk 
- Sister -> ekhtak 
- Grandfather -> jeddak 
- Grandmother -> settak 
- Uncle -> 3ammak, khelak 
- Aunt -> 3ammtak, kheltak 
- Parents -> ahlak 
- Kids -> wledak 
- Family -> 3ayltak 
- Lineage -> sliltak 
- Generation: jilak 
**Body Parts:** 
- Brain, Head -> mokhak, dmeghak 
- Face -> wejjak 
- Eye, Eyes -> 3aynak, 3younak 
- Nose -> mnekhirak 
- Mouth -> temmak, ni3ak 
- Boob -> bezzak  
- Looks -> chaklak 
- Insides -> msarinak 
- Dick -> ayrak 
- Balls -> baydatak 
- Pussy -> kessak, ottak, attouchak 
- Ass -> tizak 
- Hole -> bokhchak 
**Belongings:** 
- God -> rabbak 
- Glasses -> 3waynetak 
- Cleverness -> zakek 
- Stupidity -> habalak, baheltak 
- Blindness -> 3amek 
- Illiteracy -> ommiytak 
- Disgustingness -> arafak, jayytak 
**Exotic Combos:** 
- Eye's asshole-> bokhch tiz 3aynak 
- Grandfather's Grandmother's Sister's Eye -> 3en ekht sett jeddak 

*Note: '-ak' suffix is for males. Replace with '-ik' if talking to a female 
Example: ayre b habalak (male recipient) / ayre b habalik (female recipient)*
